title: Bug 13189: Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: 20020409I on LinuxMotif and w2k:1. Setup JUnit2.
OB: When trying to delete fields using the context menu, instead of seeing the context menu, a message dialog appears asking if I want to delete the getter/setter as well.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Setup JUnit
2. Attempt to delete fields using the context menu
